original_text: “You shall not delay to offer from the fullness of your harvest and from the outflow of your presses. The firstborn of your sons you shall give to me.
korean_text: 너는 네가 추수한 것과 네가 짜낸 즙을 바치기를 더디하지 말지며 네 처음 난 아들들을 내게 줄지며

sentences.original_text: You shall not delay to offer
from the fullness of your harvest
and from the outflow of your presses.
The firstborn of your sons you shall give to me.
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 내게 네 아들의 첫아들을 주어야 한다.
